title: Question: How do you view Riot?

embed.description: Vote Now! [Business] [Celebrity Figure (I look up to them in a aloof way, they don't know I exist)] [Elon Musk / Min-Lang Tan (of the people)]

body: I'm genuinely curious to see what people think. I have my own thoughts on this, but I'll share them later to avoid anchoring ppl. I should mention, this is **purely** for my own curiosity and I won't be using this info for anything.
